name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 9+ years of experience in designing and implementing solutions using **Python**, **SQL**, and **Airflow** expertise. Proficient in **ETL** processes, data modeling, and building robust **APIs** to ensure seamless integration within data warehousing systems. Strong background in Agile and Lean methodologies, enabling efficient project management and delivery. Proven track record of collaborating effectively across teams, utilizing critical thinking and active listening skills to foster communication and empathy. Original strengths include experience with **ReactJS**, **NextJS**, and **.NET**, contributing to a well-rounded skill set in both frontend and backend development.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed and optimized data pipelines using **Python** for efficient ETL processes, ensuring high data quality and integrity.
Designed and maintained data models and warehouses employing **SQL**, enhancing the ability to analyze data and generate meaningful insights.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams following **Agile** methodologies to deliver high-quality software solutions on time and foster effective communication.
Executed data transformations using **DBT**, streamlining data integration tasks and improving reporting capabilities.
Implemented scheduling and workflow management with **Airflow** to automate data processing tasks, increasing operational efficiency by 30%.
Built and documented **APIs** to facilitate seamless data access, ensuring robust connectivity between various services and applications.
Utilized critical thinking skills to identify and resolve complex technical challenges, improving system performance by 20%.
Advocated for Lean principles in the development process to enhance production efficiency and minimize waste.
Promoted a culture of **teamwork** and **empathy**, leading to improved collaboration and project outcomes.
Engaged in **active listening** to understand stakeholder requirements, translating them into actionable development tasks.

Designed and developed ETL processes using **Python**, optimizing data workflows and improving data integration efficiency by **20%**.
Created and managed data models and warehouses, leveraging **SQL** and **DBT** for enhanced data organization and reporting capabilities.
Implemented API integrations for data access and handling, ensuring real-time data availability and responsiveness.
Applied Agile and Lean methodologies to accelerate project timelines, leading to a **15%** reduction in overall delivery time.
Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams to define and refine project requirements, ensuring alignment with business objectives and stakeholder needs.
Utilized **Airflow** for orchestrating complex workflows, enabling automated data processing and reducing manual intervention.
Conducted comprehensive data quality checks, employing critical thinking and problem-solving skills to identify and resolve issues proactively.
Facilitated team discussions and sprint planning sessions, promoting open communication and teamwork to achieve common goals.
Engaged in active listening with team members, fostering a supportive environment to enhance collaboration and empathy.
Authored documentation and conducted user training sessions, improving end-user adoption of the developed systems.

Utilized **Python** for data modeling and ETL processes, ensuring efficient data handling across systems.

Collaborated in Agile environments to iterate on project requirements and deliver scalable software solutions on time.
Participated in daily standups, promoting effective communication and team collaboration.
